titles: The ingagement and resolution of the principall gentlemen of the county of Salop, for the raising and miantaining of forces at thier own charge, for the defence of His Majestie, their country, and more particularly the fortunes, persons, and estates of the subscribers under-named.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
